extensionAttribute.description: This attribute displays the LiveBackup server name assigned to the computer.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh if [ -f /Library/Application\ Support/Atempo/Livebackup/serverhost ];then serverName=`/bin/cat /Library/Application\ Support/Atempo/Livebackup/serverhost` echo "<result>$serverName</result>" else echo "<result>Not installed</result>" fi
